txt.en: Vadokhar feeds on flame and shadow, drawing vile strength from both. You must defeat him without allowing him to gather the power of more than one type.
Vadokhar feeds on flame and shadow, drawing vile strength from both. You must defeat him without allowing him to gather the power of more than one type.
Defeat Vadokhar without allowing him to consume more than one type of fell power

Vadokhar feeds on flame and shadow, drawing vile strength from both. You must defeat him without allowing him to gather the power of more than one type.\n\nNote: You must either defeat him while allowing him to gather only Fire or only Shadow within the encounter.
